questions.question: Have you built mobile apps for Android or iOS?
Do you prefer native development or cross-platform frameworks?
Are you familiar with mobile UI components and layouts?
Do you understand mobile app lifecycle management?
Have you worked with local storage in mobile apps?
Have you integrated REST APIs in mobile applications?
Have you published an app to Google Play or App Store?
Have you used device features like camera, GPS, or sensors?
Do you know mobile app performance optimization techniques?
